title: Aseptic Packaging Market by Type, Material, Application, & by Geography - Trends and Forecast to 2020 - Beverages Segment Expected To Dominate The Aseptic Packaging Market
content:
SOURCE Research and Markets

DUBLIN 

Research and Markets(http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/6q3wdr/aseptic_packaging) has announced the addition of the report to their offering.

The global aseptic packaging market is projected to be valued at around $62.46 Billion 

Growth in the packaging market and rise in demand for convenience products worldwide are projected to be the major drivers of the aseptic packaging market. The growing demand for pharmaceutical supplies and growth in the dairy packaging market are also projected to drive the market. Technological advancements as well as emergence of the nutraceutical market and usage of self-administered drugs will have a positive impact on the growth of the aseptic packaging market. The aseptic packaging market is dominated by large firms, such as Robert Bosch GmbH (Germany
